item.title: Adhera Therapeutics Inc 10-K
item.description: Adhera Therapeutics Inc, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 07, 2021 had 24937 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
